## Extract user_id:

```{r}
user_info_df <- import_multiple_files("user_info.csv",
                                      import_user_info)

user_info_df_2 <- user_info_df %>% 
    mutate(user_id = str_extract(file_path_id, "user_[1-9][0-9]?")) %>%
    relocate(file_path_id, user_id) %>%
    select(-file_path_id)

user_info_df_2
```
